00028 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btShapeHull
00029 {
00030 protected:
00031 
00032         btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> m_vertices;
00033         btAlignedObjectArray<unsigned int> m_indices;
00034         unsigned int m_numIndices;
00035         const btConvexShape* m_shape;
00036 
00037         static btVector3* getUnitSpherePoints();
00038 
00039 public:
00040         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();

00043         ~btShapeHull ();
00044 
00045         bool buildHull (btScalar margin);
00046

00048         int numVertices () const;
00049         int numIndices () const;
00050 
00051         const btVector3* getVertexPointer() const
00052         {
00053                 return &m_vertices[0];
00054         }
00055         const unsigned int* getIndexPointer() const
00056         {
00057                 return &m_indices[0];
00058         }
